content: this is an easy to make crochet dishcloth that uses the even moss stitch and single_crochet to make up the design i used lily sugar n cream cotton yarn but any cotton yarn would work great for this washcloth/dishcloth i do make a smaller size than standard dishcloth patterns because i have smaller hands and the bigger ones just make it hard to use **full video tutorial is available here ** https //youtu be/hbg4ga2atpc finished size is 8 5 inches x 8 inches
